sqlMap.select: select i.ID,i.MISSION_NAME AS missionName,i.CREATOR,i.MISSION_LEVEL as missionLevel,i.PLAN_TIME as planTime, i.TIME_UNIT as timeUnit,i.START_TIME as startTime,i.END_TIME as endTime,i.DESCR from t_mission_info i,t_mission_current c where (i.CREATOR=#userName# or c.CURR_EXECUTOR=#userName#) and i.ID=c.MISSION_ID ORDER BY i.START_TIME DESC LIMIT #paging.startRecord#,#paging.pageSize#
select count(1) from t_mission_info i,t_mission_current c where (i.CREATOR=#userName# or c.CURR_EXECUTOR=#userName#) and i.ID=c.MISSION_ID ORDER BY i.START_TIME DESC
